name: Database cleaner
tagline: Strategies for cleaning databases in Ruby.  Can be used to ensure a clean state for testing.
body:
### Documentation

All you need to know is here: http://www.rubydoc.info/gems/database_cleaner

### Authors and Contributors

A big thanks to everyone who has contributed to this project: https://github.com/DatabaseCleaner/database_cleaner/graphs/contributors

### Support or Contact

Having trouble? Check out [Common Errors](https://github.com/DatabaseCleaner/database_cleaner#common-errors) or [existing issues](https://github.com/DatabaseCleaner/database_cleaner/issues).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
